content: The "Share the Sacrifice Act of 2007" establishes a temporary Iraq War surtax for the taxable year beginning in 2008. The "Temporary Iraq War Surtax" applies to taxable years starting after December 31, 2007 and is not considered a change in tax rate for section 15 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
